targets.query:
from(bucket: "${server}")
  |> range(start: -10y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["player"] == "${player}")
  |> first()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "${server}")
  |> range(start: -10y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["player"] == "${player}")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: -10y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["player"] == "${player}")
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with
    _value: r._value * 10
  }))
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["player", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: -10y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "deaths")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["player"] == "${player}")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "errors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "warnings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "clients")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "threads")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory" or r["_measurement"] == "memoryManaged")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "generatingChunks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "entities" or r["_measurement"] == "entitiesActive")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "chunks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "clients")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "errors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "warnings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "overloadwarnings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with
    _value: r._value * 10
  }))
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["player", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] < $ping)

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "logticks")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "logticks")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ms > ${logtickMs})

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "${server}",
  tag: "player",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -1y
)
list.name: player
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "${server}",
  tag: "player",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -1y
)
